### used() {#a8f5c6f9a9d50b1d06510d43a736e9be9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual void llvm::mca::ResourceStrategy::used (uint64&#95;t ResourceMask)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Called by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/resourcemanager">ResourceManager</a> when a processor resource group, or a processor resource with multiple units has become unavailable.

The default strategy uses this information to bias its selection logic.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/hardwareunits/resourcemanager-h/#l00062">62</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mca/include/llvm/mca/hardwareunits/resourcemanager-h">ResourceManager.h</a>.
